alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:43PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MEADE AND SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM MDT... At 142 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Roubaix Lake, or 10 miles southeast of Lead, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Nemo around 200 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Dalton Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
